Articles.Content: I have tried adjusting the aspect ratio.....and I am still unable to see the sides or top of the game screen on my TV?
I think you can also change aspect ratio through the in game settings, I'm sure this is what I had to do, I'm also on xbox and the edges of the screen where obscured. Hope this helps.
Your TV should have a setting where you can change the picture display size. In fact my remote has a button specifically for pic size.
